item.description:
Walktoberfest
Anheuser Busch-Inc.
221 Daniel Webster Highway
Merrimack, NH

Morning Dog Walk-a-thon followed by a day of fun, food and entertainment for the entire family including dogs!
Dogs welcomed ALL DAY! Dogs must be properly leashed (no flex leads) and vaccinated.

Spread the news! Shelter Dogs will be available for on the spot adoption at Walktoberfest!

Admission: Adults/Kids 12+ $5.00 Kids 11 & under FREE
Free Admission for those collecting Walk-a-thon pledges!

2009 Registration & Pledge Form: http://www.hsfn.org/c...


Safety Reminders:
• Dress for the weather.
This is a rain-or-shine event.
• ALL dogs must be leashed, licensed, and be
up-to-date with all vaccines. No Flex Leashes please.
• For their safety, NO CATS
or SMALL ANIMALS.
• Part of the walk is in a grassy area, take proper precautions to protect yourself and your pet from fleas, ticks and/or mosquitoes.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: 26th Annual Walktoberfest
